name: Jen's Adventure
description:
Out for an evening jog a college student happens upon a shocking accident... or not. You decide her fate.

Jen's Adventure is an Interactive Film Project. 

Directed, Written, and Produced by: Gerald Adamson

Technical Programming Director and Co-Producer: Travis Huff 

Assistant Director: Christine Todd

Editor: Cody Fitch

Starring: Yvette Harper, Grace Ward, Hyrum Adamson, Max Knudson, Keri Boyle, Tracie Pinto, Tara Lancaster, David Ybarra, and Glenda Talbutt.

Built with Unity. Video edited with Adobe Premier Pro. 

Donations will be used for future productions.
